bool IDzTextInputFile::getLine ( char **  tokens,
int &  nTokens 
) [pure virtual]

Reads a single line from the file and parses it into individual tokens separated by whitespace.

Parameters:
tokens The whitespace-separated tokens from the next line in the file
nTokens The number of tokens in the line read
Returns:
false on error or when the end of the file is reached.

Implemented in DzTextInputFileAdapter.
